page.title: 12EVENTS IN CHIPPENHAM
page.content: Each year there are a number of public events in and around{Chippenham. The major event is the{Chippenham {Carvival}held over a week in late June each year.A fair comes to the town, there are sporting events and a carnival procession through the main streets of the town,with decorated floats.Money is raised for various charities. On Spring Bank Holiday Weekend there is a{Folk Festival.}This event attracts local dancers,singers and entertainers who perform in the streets. On the{River Avon}there is an annual {raft race}when local groups build rafts and try to sail down the river. Chippenham also enters the{Britian in {Bloom}competition,shops and businesses display hanging baskets and window boxes.
